Package com.foreach.across.modules.properties.config

Interface EntityPropertiesDescriptor

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractEntityPropertiesConfiguration
public interface EntityPropertiesDescriptor
Configuration descriptor for an EntityProperties instance.
Author:
Arne Vandamme

  • Method Details

    • entityClass

      Class<?> entityClass()
      Returns:
      Entity class these are custom properties for.

    • propertiesId

      String propertiesId()
      Returns:
      Unique id of the properties registry.

    • tableName

      String tableName()
      Returns:
      Database table name where the properties are persisted.

    • keyColumnName

      String keyColumnName()
      Returns:
      Name of the key column in the database table.

    • dataSource

      DataSource dataSource()
      Returns:
      DataSource in which to find the properties table.

    • conversionService

      org.springframework.core.convert.ConversionService conversionService()
      Returns:
      ConversionService to use for the (de-)serializing.

    • trackingRepository

      PropertyTrackingRepository trackingRepository()
      Returns:
      The repository in which to track the registered properties.

    • registry

      EntityPropertiesRegistry registry()
      Returns:
      The registry where custom properties are registered.

    • service

      EntityPropertiesServiceBase service()
      Returns:
      The service that manages the property persistence.
